summary: The diff implements all four requirements with good coverage. REQ-1 (backend), REQ-2 (hook), REQ-3 (component), and REQ-4 (navigation/view) are all addressed. However, REQ-1's backend implementation in main.mo is truncated and cannot be fully verified. REQ-4 specifies showing both diet AND workout plan results after submission, but the implementation shows them in separate tabs. Minor concerns exist but most ACs are satisfied.

missing_requirements.requirement: After a user selects their fitness goal and submits, show both the diet plan results and the workout plan results.
missing_requirements.reason: The implementation places diet and workout plans in separate tabs (AI Diet Planner and Workout Planner) rather than showing both results together after a single submission. The WorkoutPlannerView only shows workout plan results, not both diet and workout results simultaneously.

hallucinated_features.description: DietPlannerForm was modified to accept a configurable submitLabel prop and showStats prop for reuse across planners, with an altered onSubmit signature.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request did not specifically request modifying DietPlannerForm's interface with new props. While reusing the form is a reasonable implementation choice, these interface changes were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Workout planner theme tokens (--workout-primary, --workout-accent, --workout-bg) added to CSS and Tailwind config as a separate color namespace.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request required visual consistency with the existing diet planner theme but did not explicitly request a new separate Tailwind color namespace or new CSS custom properties for workout theming.
